ygData.subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Lunarpine smiles at Shadow Wing I suppose you re right, I ve been out here to long. I suppose that it s time I learned about myself. The only way to do that

Lunarpine smiles at Shadow Wing
"I suppose you're right, I've been out here to long. I suppose that 
it's time I learned about myself. The only way to do that is to meet 
my own kind. So as the old saying goes"Take me to your leader"

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Logo morph" <logomorph@h...> wrote:
> ::Shadow Wing::
> 
> She looked at him with a slight smile.
> "I take it you've lost touch with your techno side. I do that from 
time to 
> time as well.  You let the animal take over. Sometimes that's a 
good thing.  
> But you forget some of the little techno details about yourself 
when you do 
> that. Don't worry, your techno side will return to you."
> She chuckled slightly. "Don't worry, when we encounter Preds, and 
we will, 
> your techno side will kick in and you'll be back to your old robot 
self."
> 
> 
> 
> ------Original Message-----
> From:   <cyberwolf4@p...>
> Date: Fri Jun 30, 2000 4:53pm
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars(The great north)
> 
> Lunarpine was still puzzled on all this strange new information he
> was hearing. this was all so odd to him, he was having trouble
> compileing his robot mode. Lunarpines wolf instincts kept him alive
> in the wilderness. He sat in quiet thought for a moment, when
> something inside told him to scan internal functions. There he found
> it, "comlink" as plain as day, and he knew what came next.
> 
> "Comline online, scan incoming frequencies" He instructed in a
> demanding voice.
> "SCANNING" he heard a voice inside his head
> Lunarpine now picked up the signal from the unknown source
> 
> 
> 
> 
> 
>
